content: All previously added Users became Guests and now available in the Contacts list of the {{productName}} administrators only. Guests are no longer part of any groups. You can always change their type and add them to a group, if necessary.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe a change in user roles within a product. It explains that users who were previously added are now guests and only visible to administrators in the Contacts list. The text aims to inform users about this change.

usage.context:
<StyledBody>
 <Text fontSize="12px" fontWeight={400} lineHeight="16px" noSelect>
 <Trans
 t={t}
 ns="Translations"
 i18nKey="GuestReleaseTipDescripton"
 values={{ productName: t("Common:ProductName") }}
 />
 </Text>
 {accessRightsLink ? (
 <Link

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "{{productName}}" in the Azerbaijani translation is correct, but consistency with the English source should be maintained throughout all translations. Ensure this placeholder is always used in the same way.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but ensure consistent application across all translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation retains the English formatting using {{productName}}. While acceptable, it might be more natural to replace it with the localized product name if available.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ideally, replace {{productName}} with the localized name of the product. If no localized name is available, keeping it as is is acceptable, but consider localizing it for future updates.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon in '{{productName}} :n' is unnecessary and breaks the flow of the sentence. It appears to be an artifact of the original template insertion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after '{{productName}}' to read '{{productName}}:n'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'change their type' is awkward. A more natural translation for 'type' in this context might be 'status' or 'role'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Դուք միշտ կարող եք փոխել նրանց կարգավիճակը կամ դերակարգը և անհրաժեշտության դեպքում նրանց ավելացնել խմբին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The last phrase 'add them to a group' is slightly separated from the previous clause. There should be a conjunction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Դուք միշտ կարող եք փոխել նրանց կարգավիճակը կամ դերակարգը, և անհրաժեշտության դեպքում նրանց ավելացնել խմբին:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'available in the Contacts list' is not accurately translated. '사용할 수 있습니다' (usable) doesn't convey the meaning of being visible or listed. It implies functionality, not visibility.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이전에 추가한 모든 사용자는 게스트가 되었으며 이제 {{productName}} 관리자의 연락처 목록에 표시됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Guests are no longer part of any groups' is slightly awkward in Korean. While technically correct, it lacks natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 게스트는 더 이상 그룹에 포함되지 않습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes multiple instances of spacing before punctuation marks (e.g., before 'ຂອງ'). This is not standard Lao formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the extra spaces before punctuation marks throughout the text. For example, change 'ຂອງຜູ້ບໍລິຫານ' to 'ຂອງຜູ້ບໍລິຫານ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ເຂົາເຈົ້າ' is used for 'them' referring to the guests. While not strictly incorrect, it's slightly informal and less precise in this context. 'ພວກເຂົາ' might be a more appropriate pronoun for a formal document.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ເຂົາເຈົ້າ' with 'ພວກເຂົາ' for increased formality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Guests" is consistently translated as "Viesi". While technically correct, "Viesi" can sometimes imply a less formal or temporary status than intended. Consider if a more formal term like "Viesi lietotāji" might be more appropriate to convey the intended meaning of users who have lost their original permissions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "Viesi lietotāji" for greater clarity and formality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'as necessary' in the English version is translated as 'Ja nepieciešams'. While correct, 'ja nepieciešams' can sound a bit abrupt in Latvian. A softer phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing 'Ja nepieciešams' to 'vadzītu' or 'ja nepieciešams, lai'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'hóspedes' (guests) should ideally be translated as 'Convidados' to align better with the original 'Guests'. While 'hóspedes' can mean guests, 'convidados' is more commonly used in a formal or administrative context, like the one described.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Todos os Usuários adicionados anteriormente tornaram-se Convidados e agora estão disponíveis apenas na lista de Contatos dos administradores {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Usuários' might be better as 'Utilizadores' depending on the specific Portuguese variant being used (Brazilian vs. European Portuguese). It's a matter of regional preference.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Todos os Utilizadores adicionados anteriormente tornaram-se Convidados e agora estão disponíveis apenas na lista de Contatos dos administradores {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Os hóspedes já não fazem parte de nenhum grupo' can be slightly improved for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Os Convidados não fazem mais parte de nenhum grupo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation includes "{{productName}}" without the closing brace. This indicates a formatting issue that needs to be addressed to ensure proper rendering in the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "administratorilor{{productName}}" to "administratorilor{{productName}}"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Persoane de contact' translates to 'Contacts', but it's slightly awkward in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Lista de Contacte'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'lista Persoane de contact' to 'lista de contacte'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Puteți schimba tipul și să le adăugați în orice grup oricând este necesar' is grammatically correct but stylistically could be improved. It sounds a bit verbose. A more concise and elegant way to express it is 'Puteți oricând să le schimbați tipul și să le adăugați în orice grup'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'Puteți schimba tipul și să le adăugați în orice grup oricând este necesar' to 'Puteți oricând să le schimbați tipul și să le adăugați în orice grup'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයින්' (parishiilakayin) is a less common and potentially inaccurate translation for 'Users' in this context. It's more formal and doesn't convey the casual user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'භාවිතරයන්' (bhavittharayan) or 'පරිශීලකයන්' (parishiilakayan) - depending on the desired level of formality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'සියලු පෙරදී එකතු කළ' (siyallu peradi ekathu kala) is grammatically correct, but slightly verbose. It could be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'පහු dulu එකතු කළ සියලු' (pahu dulu ekathu kala) or a more direct phrasing like 'මුලින් එකතු කළ සියලු' (mulin ekathu kala).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of the variable {{productName}} is consistent with the English version, which is good.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed. Ensure consistency across all translations using this variable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ආරාධිතයන් කිසිදු සමූහයකට අයත් නොවේ' (Aaradhithayan kisidu samuhayakata ayatha nowe) translates literally as 'Guests do not belong to any group'. While technically correct, it doesn't fully convey the nuance of being *removed* from groups. A more expressive translation might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ආරාධිතයන් දැන් කිසිදු සමූහයකට ඇතුළත් නොවී' (Aaradhithayan dan kiidu samuhayakata ethulaath novii) - 'Guests are no longer included in any group'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'සමූහයක' (samuhayakata) is repeated several times. While grammatically correct, it might feel slightly repetitive and could be varied for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using synonyms for 'group' (if appropriate) in subsequent instances to improve flow (e.g., 'මණ්ඩලයක').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a Cyrillic character (Љ) which is incorrect for "Lj". The English text uses {{productName}} which should also be implemented in the Serbian translation to indicate a variable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сви претходно додани корисници постали су гости и сада су доступни само у контакт листи администратора {{productName}}. Гости више нису део ниједне групе. Увек можете променити њихов тип и додати их у групу, ако је потребно.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Contacts list' is translated as 'контакт листи'. A more accurate translation would be 'списку контаката' or 'адресар'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сви претходно додани корисници постали су гости и сада су доступни само у списку контаката администратора {{productName}}. Гости више нису део ниједне групе. Увек можете променити њихов тип и додати их у групу, ако је потребно.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Svi prethodno dodani korisnici postali su gosti" is a slightly awkward translation. A more natural phrasing would be 'Prethodno dodani korisnici sada su gosti'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prethodno dodani korisnici sada su gosti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kontakt' is used for 'contacts'. While understandable, 'kontaktná lista' or 'lista kontakata' would be more precise and commonly used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: kontaktná lista

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'njihov tip' is a bit vague and potentially ambiguous. It's not clear what 'tip' refers to in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: njihov status

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Konuk statüsüne geldi' (became Guest status) is not the most natural way to express the change. While technically correct, it's slightly awkward. A more fluid translation would be something like 'Konuk olarak yeniden sınıflandırıldı' (reclassified as Guests).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konuk olarak yeniden sınıflandırıldı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'türlerini değiştirebilir' is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would be 'tipini değiştirebilirsiniz'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tipini değiştirebilirsiniz

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation includes 'й' instead of 'і' after 'стають'. This creates an unnatural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Всі раніше додані користувачі стають гостями і тепер доступні...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'became Guests' is not accurately reflected. 'Khách' translates to 'Guest' but the implication of changing status isn't fully conveyed. A more accurate translation would emphasize the change in user status.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tất cả Người dùng đã thêm trước đó đã được chuyển thành Khách

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'type' is translated literally as 'loại'. While technically correct, it might be better to use a more natural-sounding phrase in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tất cả Người dùng đã thêm trước đó đã được chuyển thành Khách. Khách không còn thuộc bất kỳ nhóm nào nữa. Bạn luôn có thể thay đổi vai trò của họ và thêm họ vào một nhóm, nếu cần.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "所有之前添加的用户都已成为访客" is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness.  A more idiomatic translation might be something like "之前添加的用户现在都变成了访客" or "之前添加的用户现在都已变为访客".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 之前添加的用户现在都变成了访客

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "群组" could be more accurately translated to "组" or "团队" depending on the context of the product. "群组" implies a large, potentially disorganized group.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 组

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "如有必要" is grammatically correct but could be more naturally expressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 必要时
